social_media_trends.csv:
Please answer the following statements according to your behaviour throughout the Covid-19 pandemic i.e., ‘throughout lockdown I took part in...’/ ‘throughout lockdown I was inspired by social media to take part in...’
Some of the statements have prompts and examples to aid recall, but please think carefully so that answers are as genuine as possible. This questionnaire should take no more than 5 minutes
Following a new exercise instructor/influencer (e.g. Grace fit, Joe Wicks, Chloe Ting)
Cooking new things/ cooking challenges (e.g. ‘tomato feta pasta’ on tiktok)
Baking new things/ baking challenges (e.g. ‘cloud bread’, ‘pancake cereal’, ‘rainbow cakes’)
Campaigning for social and political movements
Downloaded/ started using video chat apps more often (e.g. ‘houseparty’)
Challenges involving alcoholic beverages (e.g. Snapchat/Instagram pint challenge)
Shopping (e.g. buying new appliances, clothes, cosmetics, ingredients, or any other product)
Changing my style or physical appearances
Changing my beliefs or believing in something new (e.g. political, religious, spiritual, theoretical, conspiracy)
Changing my opinion on the covid vaccine - (e.g. whether or not to receive it)
Having a change in opinion/ acceptance of previously controversial ideas (e.g. body positivity, diminishing gender norms)
Forming alternative methods of income (e.g. crypto/stocks, small business)
Watching trending TV shows/movies (e.g. tiger king)
Changing my attitudes towards people present on online platforms i.e. Celebrities and influencers (e.g. ‘cancel culture’, James Charles, Kanye West)
Renovating/ decorating my home or another home or part of
Following a trend that includes my pet (e.g. getting my dog to hold an egg, showing your dog as a puppy compared to now)
